name: Billiards Bonanza!
description:
Billiards as you know it ------  or is it?

In this pixelated 2-player rendition of the classic game of 8 ball game, you may play however you want! You can play a laid back, normal game of 8 ball. Or, you can play a fun, randomized, mind-blowing and chance-taking game of eight ball with the different modifiers listed under the "Settings" menu.

These modifiers include:

  • Ball Switching - When you shoot the cue ball, the balls will randomly switch places on you! Aim wisely!Watch the balls magically switch before your eyes!
  • Pocket Blockers - When you shoot the ball, it is possible for there to be a blockade put up to hinder your ability to pocket the ball!They won't let you pocket!
  • Darkness - Oh no! The lights turn out when you need them on.  After the balls settle, the lights will turn off.Woah! How are you supposed to shoot in this?
  • Earthquakes -  Hold on! The room will shake causing the balls to move randomly after the balls settle!Hold on!
  • Sight Aimer - This helps  you find out where you are aiming to give you a more precise shotNice of it to help you, huh?

Using your mouse to aim and the arrow keys to adjust the power settings, you can become a Billiards Bonanza! fanatic and become a legendary 8-ball player!

Good luck, have fun and get to breaking!

<<2 Players are needed to play this game>>

Note: This is the first version of the game, let me know any feedback you have!
